All staff of HQ NHAI registered with "Biometric Attendance System" are requested to adhere to following points deliberately whenever attending office a) Properly register ingress/egress daily, they should try after gap of 15 minutes if system is bUSy, but registering attendance is mandatory daily. b} Prior intimation of leave or tour details to HR-| , C Record ingress/egress their itself if going to any Government office in Delhi; This issues with the approval of Competent Authority nkk (Col.S.S.Kapur) G.M:(HR/Admn:)I AlL Stalt_HQ_ NHAL (Staff concerned) 3414 MiMrmI IHAL New
